scripts.debug: node -e "console.log('Args:', JSON.stringify(process.argv, null, 2)); console.log('ENV URL:', process.env.npm_config_url); console.log('ENV KEY:', process.env.npm_config_apikey);"
scripts.prepare-env: bash -lc '[ -f .env ] && echo ".env exists, skipping" || (cp .env.example .env && echo ".env created")'
scripts.prepare-env:cli:
node -e "const url = process.argv[1]; const key = process.argv[2]; const finalUrl = url || process.env.npm_config_url; const finalKey = key || process.env.npm_config_apikey; if (!finalUrl || !finalKey) { console.log('Usage:
  npm run prepare-env:cli -- <TICKETS_URL> <TICKETS_API_KEY>
Or via npm config:
  npm run prepare-env:cli --url=<TICKETS_URL> --apikey=<TICKETS_API_KEY>'); process.exit(1); } require('fs').writeFileSync('.env', \`TICKETS_URL=\${finalUrl}
TICKETS_API_KEY=\${finalKey}
PORT=3001
\`); console.log('.env created');"
